home.title: A modern download manager
home.desc: Open source, lightweight, native, supports (HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet , etc.) for downloading.
home.feat1.title: Full Platform Support
home.feat1.desc: No more worries about different platform download tools
home.feat2.title: High Speed
home.feat2.desc: Using Golang coroutines for concurrent downloads at the underlying level
home.feat3.title: Beautiful UI
